channel.title: +rAjagopAla translation on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +rAjagopAla translation on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: GSS corrected
item.description: Limitations of proof reading done: No efforts have been made to check if Tamil names, Tamil words and Tamil stanzas are spelt correctly. Not sure if Tamil stanzas are at their right places. No formatting except chapter headings which are “Heading 2”. Translator’s notes converted to foot-notes[ Except one long Note which does not deserve to be relegated as a footnote]. Foot notes of first few chapters, work on which was abandoned half-way appear dumped as End-notes.
